tool.name: SCCAF Assesment
tool.description: runs an assesment of an SCCAF optimisation result or an existing clustering.
tool.command:
ln -s ${input_obj_file} input.h5 &&
sccaf-assess -i input.h5 --iterations $iterations --cores \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} -o sccaf_assess.txt #if $rounds_file --slot-for-existing-clustering \$( cat $rounds_file ) #else --slot-for-existing-clustering $existing_slot #end if

param.name: source
param.label: Choose the source of the slot for existing clustering
param.help: either a round file or an explicit name of a round.
param.option: Input the desired round through a file

param.name: existing_slot
param.label: Specific round to asses
param.help: Write the slot of the AnnData object that you want assessed.

param.name: rounds_file
param.label: A file containing a single round to asses in the AnnData file.

param.name: iterations
param.label: Iterations for assesment
param.help: The number of times that the assesment is internally repeated to achieve a result.

data.name: output_table
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string} assesment accuracy and cross validation.
